price: Atë Ditë, secili prej tyre do të ketë aq shqetësim për veten, sa do t’i mjaftojë.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
